title: At Fetterman Rally, Obama Mocks Oz and Tells Crowd to Vote for Democracy
description: Former President Barack Obama, campaigning in Pittsburgh with John Fetterman as he seeks to become senator, urged supporters to vote to save democracy and abortion rights.
dc:creator: Trip Gabriel
media:description: Former President Barack Obama campaigned for Lt. Gov. John Fetterman, the Democratic candidate in the Pennsylvania Senate race, at a rally in Pittsburgh on Saturday.
